com.nbcuni.mps

Class MPS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nbcuni.mps.MPS

  • public class MPS
extends java.lang.Object
    Automates the connection to MPS, Google Ads and facilitates tracking.

      • getSiteConfig

        public org.json.JSONObject getSiteConfig()
        MPS Configuration.
        Returns:
        site configuration if it was already received and did not contain any errors. Otherwise the default config would be returned.

      • getSiteConfig

        public void getSiteConfig(MPSSiteConfigListener siteConfigListener)
        MPS Configuration from server. This function will never return default config and will always perform a network call.
        Parameters:
        siteConfigListener - listener that will pass site configuration as soon as it will be received.

      • requestPageObject

        public MPSPage requestPageObject(MPSPageParameters parameters)
        Gets MPS page object for selected parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - parameters for the ad.
        Returns:
        MPSPage object for given params.

      • setUpdateCorrelator

        public void setUpdateCorrelator(boolean shouldUpdate)
        Boolean to control updating Correlator between pages. Default is true.
        Parameters:
        shouldUpdate - boolean to control updating Correlator between pages.
